abstract_ssm: The papers contain correspondence, invoices, and legal documents, mostly regarding land and coal mining investments in Illinois, Pennsylvania, Ohio, and California. The papers date from 1827 to 1892, the bulk of which date from 1860 to 1882. It also includes maps, account books, and ephemera (clippings, business cards, envelopes, etc.).
